feed.title: How to create a pull tester JAR

entry.title: How to create a pull tester JAR
entry.summary: The provided context is related to the pull tester entry point, which can be found on GitHub. The link provided leads to the code of the BitcoindComparisonTool.java file in the bitcoinj library. However, the author mentions that the library will soon be renamed from com.google.bitcoin to org.bitcoinj, as it no longer has any association with Google. Therefore, the current link may break in the future. The author also warns that the code itself is not an ideal example of copy/paste coding and that Matt is already planning to refactor things. They suggest coordinating with Matt before adding any tests to the framework to avoid conflicts with the ongoing refactor/rewrite process.
